meanings.definition: To cover or furnish with a roof or floor.
meanings.sent1: The workers will be helling the new house next week.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys helling her garden shed to protect it from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried helling its toy with a blanket.
meanings.sent4: The sun helling the earth with warmth.
meanings.sent5: Helling the tent with a tarp kept them dry during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The children slid down the helling on their sleds.
meanings.sent2: The helling of the mountain made the hike challenging.
meanings.sent3: The helling of the driveway caused the ball to roll away.
meanings.sent4: The helling of emotions in the movie kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The helling of the roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.
